description: This file is a Flutter application's main entry point defining the root widget and home page layout.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application establishing theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget serving as the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class implementing the UI code for MyHomePage, displaying a progress message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method to construct UI for MyApp and MyHomePage widgets.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
